name: NATIONAL CENTER FOR TRANSGENDER EQUALITY ACTION FUND
sampleDescriptions:
Equality Act
Trans Service Members
REAL ID

HR1032 and S373 - These bills protect transgender members of the Armed Services from discrimination and ensure that transgender people can serve openly in the United States military.  

HRes 124 - Thi

HR5 "Equality Act" - This bill prohibits discrimination on the basis of sex, sexual orientation, and gender identity in employment, housing, public accommodations, federally-funded programs, credit, a
